    • getSheduleUpdate

      @GET("/scheduler/update") @Headers({"Content-Type: application/json","accept: application/json"}) retrofit2.Call<List<String>> getSheduleUpdate(@Header("authorization") String token, @Query("schedule") String schedule)
      Method that performs a request to update the task execution schedule
      Parameters:
      token - authorization token
      schedule - schedule according to which tasks will be executed
      Returns:
      Callable list of strings
